traits.name: Awakening of the Scion
entries: The cradle is a container for the {@creature scion of Skoraeus|BGG}. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body crumbles to dust. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The cradle makes two Slam or Spit Rock attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spit Rock
entries: Ranged atk +15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition.

actions.name: Shattering Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The cradle lets out a painfully load roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the cradle must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10 damage) thunder damage and has the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the end of its next turn.
